column1:
Update webpack-isomorphic-tools to version 2.2.45 🚀


Hello 👋
🚀🚀🚀
webpack-isomorphic-tools just published its new version 2.2.45 which is not covered by your current version range.
If this pull request passes your tests you can publish your software with the latest version of webpack-isomorphic-tools – otherwise use this branch to work on adaptions and fixes.
Happy fixing and merging 🌴

It keeps your software up to date all the time.
